Each generator walks the AST, maps types, emits functions, expressions, control flow, and resource declarations.

Business intent: To simplify development of cross‑platform rendering engines by allowing a single shader representation to be emitted for any target graphics backend, reducing duplication and ensuring consistency across DirectX, OpenGL, Metal, Vulkan, etc.
